ygData.subject: Re: openglad-e dev update
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, a few places need changing for addition tiles. Nothing major though. scen.cpp was the only file that really used smoother for what it was meant for;

Yeah, a few places need changing for addition tiles. Nothing major though.

scen.cpp was the only file that really used smoother for what it was
meant for; however that file is dead. Any type of scenario editor will
be built from the ground up, or included into the game itself. There
are other parts of the code, such as level.cpp and weap.cpp, that use
smoother to query tile types but that functionality could easily be
added without the use of smoother.

Was there any new tile types you had in mind?

> *smiles* You're going to have to create new tile types sooner or
> later.  As I recall, there's only **let's see*** 3-4 places to change
> in order to add new map tiles.
> 
> pixdefs.h
> radar.cpp
> scen.cpp
> loader.cpp
> level.cpp
> smooth.cpp (is this really used by anything other than the scenario
> editor?)
